titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 1217) to repeal the Prevention and Public Health Fund.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 112-61, by Ms. Foxx.

The resolution waives all points of order against consideration of the bill. The resolution makes in order only those amendments printed in the report. All points of order against the amendments are waived.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 30.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 219.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 238 - 182 (Roll no. 257).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 237 - 180 (Roll no. 258).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 4/12/2011--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for consideration of the bill (H.R. 1217) to repeal the Prevention and Public Health Fund.
